name: Cave Goat
description: The Cave Goat is a small, agile beast with strong physical attributes, particularly adept at climbing rocky surfaces.
memorable: Keen Hearing grants it enhanced perception capabilities, and it excels in climbing with its Sturdy Climber ability.
goals: Typically, it seeks to navigate rugged terrains and evade threats.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores making it physically resilient.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma indicating poor cognitive abilities.
attacks: Can perform a Ram melee attack dealing 4 bludgeoning damage with good accuracy.
most_powerful_ability: Sturdy Climber enhances climbing ability significantly.
senses: Keen Hearing allows it to hear better than most creatures.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, allowing it to climb effectively.
additional_information: Keen Hearing provides advantage on hearing-based perception checks.
Sturdy Climber gives advantage on Strength athletics checks when climbing.
Strong physical power despite being a beast.
Relatively low cognitive functioning affects decision-making.
Fast movement speed for its size.
test_queries: Cave Goat with keen hearing skills
small creature that can ram attackers
